For the record (since I had to work this out) the formulas are:


X = x * Y / y
Y = Y (of course)
Z = -(Y * (x + y -1)) / y


Wolfram Alpha can solve equations, which was really useful when I was 
tired and didn't want to fiddle with the algebra.
